info.title: Digital Research Books Search API
info.description: RESTful API for the Digital Research Books Project

get.description: Queries DRB collection via ElasticSearch and returns work objects

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query field/term pair (e.g. keyword:baseball or subject:cricket). Valid fields are keyword, title, author and subject

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort option field/direction pair (e.g. title:desc). Valid options are: title, author and date

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Fiter option field/term pair (e.g. language:French). Valid options are date, language and format

parameters.name: showAll
parameters.description: Setting that controls display of either all editions (true) or only editions with links (false)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Sets the page of results to return

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Sets the number of results to return per page

get.description: Return a single work record identified by a UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID for work record

parameters.name: showAll
parameters.description: If True all editions are returned, if False only editions with readable links are returned

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for Edition record

parameters.name: showAll
parameters.description: If True all editions are returned, if False only editions with readable links are returned

get.description: Return a single link record with a nested work to provide context

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for Link record

get.description: Returns an array of all languages present in the collection, optionally with total counts for each language

parameters.name: totals
parameters.description: If True return total counts for languages, if False return only languages

200.description: A response containing an array of all
